Without context
mo:topic.mo:description:
The gamification is not framed to a context

  • Gamification per-se
  • Gamification in any context
  • Gamification model/framework

mo:comment.text:
As the RO(1) is to discover gamification solutions to solve

user engagement problems in "different kinds of applications

and websites", identify existing gaps, and suggest further studies


Then the context is withoutcontext or any context
Não parece Engenharia de Software e sim engajamento do usuário
